name: Secret Plans
originalText:
Face-down creatures you control get +0/+1.
Whenever a permanent you control is turned face up, draw a card.

rulings.text: As soon as a creature turns face up, it loses the +0/+1 from Secret Plans. If damage marked on that creature is equal to or greater than its new toughness, the creature will be destroyed.
